CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t Struct Reference
CANFD Driver » CANFD Driver External Data Structures

Data structure defines the ECC Error forcing. More...

#include <drivers/canfd/canfd.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t errType

Detailed Description

Data structure defines the ECC Error forcing.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::bit1

Column/Data bit that needs to be flipped when force_sec or force_ded is set

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::bit2

Data bit that needs to be flipped when force_ded is set

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::errForce

Force error on the next RAM read

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::errOnce

Force Error once 1: The error will inject an error to the specified row only once

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::errType

Error type to be forced Refer enum CANFD_MCANECCErrType.

uint32_t CANFD_MCANECCErrForceParams_t::rowNum

Row address where error needs to be applied.
